EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-30 Tackling the Modern IT Ecosystem.Thanks for joining us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=Our Webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our webinar on {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}. You can watch the webinar on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-ecosytem-wbn/]]>. Our agnostic platform (supports VMware, AWS, Azure, etc.) provides ongoing optimization both on-premise and once workloads are in the cloud to ensure you’re only paying for what you consume. For a bit more context, please see the resources below:
- What Turbonomic Does, Interview with Ben Nye, CEO, Turbonomic via theCUBE <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/thecube-what-turbonomic-does]]> - Freshfields Plans AWS and Azure Migrations and Saves 20% on Azure Bill <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/freshfields-success-story]]> - Migrate to Microsoft Azure in 7 Days with Turbonomic <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-for-azure-migrations/7-days-to-azure]]>
We hope you find this information helpful. Enjoy the recording!
-Team Turbonomic
